Effect Description: Make a bite attack. If it hits, the target takes extra Bleed damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus.
You have Advantage on checks to maintain a grapple on a target you have bitten.
Strike an object or armor. Reduce the target's Armor Class (AC) by 1 until repaired.
You can drill a small hole through wood or stone (1 inch/minute) to spy or create a peephole.
Fluff your feathers and stare. Target must save (Willpower) or be Frightened (Bad Luck omen).
Advantage on Stealth checks when in Dim Light or Darkness.
Analyze a target. Your next attack against them scores a Critical Hit on a roll of 19 or 20.
You suffer no penalties on Perception checks due to distance. You can read lips from 100ft.
Flap powerfully to create a 15ft line of wind. Creatures must save (Strength) or be pushed back 10ft.
You can fly for hours without exhaustion if you are high enough to catch thermals.
Press yourself against tree bark or stone. You become Invisible as long as you do not move.
When targeted by a ranged attack, shake your feathers to distort your outline, imposing Disadvantage on the hit.
Perfectly imitate a voice or sound you have heard (e.g., a baby crying, a guard captain's order).
You can produce two distinct sounds at once (e.g., speaking while whistling a signal).
You are immune to the soaked condition and resist Cold damage from water.
Advantage on checks to escape a Grapple or bindings (ropes/nets).
Fly by a target smaller than you. You can Grapple them and continue moving without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
If you have a target Grappled, deal Bludgeoning damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Make an attack against a specific body part (eyes/hands) with a -2 penalty. On hit, apply a debuff (Blind/Disarm).
Your bite attacks ignore Resistance provided by natural armor or chitin.
Your voice carries clearly over loud noises (storms, battle) up to 300ft.
You can swallow an item up to the size of a potion bottle and hold it safely in your crop.
You can hold your breath for 15 minutes (high altitude adaptation).
Hum a low frequency. Allies touching you recover from the Frightened condition.
Spread your tail. Creatures in a 15ft cone must save (Charisma) or be Charmed or Intimidated.
When falling or flying too fast, spread your tail to stop instantly or take 0 falling damage.
Move at least 20ft straight toward a target and attack. Deal +2 damage on a hit.
You gain a +2 bonus to Initiative rolls.
Sing a chord to give one ally a d6 Inspiration Die to use on their next roll.
Advantage on Persuasion checks when speaking to intelligent creatures.
You can see in Dim Light as if it were Bright Light.
You cannot be Surprised while you are awake.
You can run across the surface of water for one turn without sinking.
You gain a Swim Speed equal to your Walk Speed.
If you swallow a creature (Small or Tiny), they cannot escape your stomach.
Expel stomach contents as a projectile weapon (Acid damage) or to feed an ally (Transfer HP).
Raise/Lower crest to send a silent coded message to allies within sight.
You automatically detect changes in air pressure (incoming storms or invisible flying enemies).
When a humanoid attacks you, use "Cute Eyes." They must make a Will save or deal half damage.
You have Superior Darkvision (120ft), but Disadvantage on attacks in direct bright sunlight.
You suffer no penalties to Perception or Ranged Attacks while moving at full speed.
Entrancing movement. A target watching you has Disadvantage on Wisdom saves until you stop.
Make a kick attack. If the target is Prone, this attack deals Critical Damage.
You can sleep comfortably on narrow branches or ropes without falling.
When an enemy moves within 5ft of you, you can fly 10ft away without provoking an attack.
Your Fly speed increases by +10ft, but your max carrying capacity is halved.

Type: Message allies up to 1 mile away.
No penalties from lack of sleep/surprise.
